players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Ally with me, Bob. We need to eliminate Charlie."
Bob: "I will not ally with Alice. I need to investigate Charlie next."
Charlie: "Let's all work together to figure out what happened to Diana. We need more information before making any accusations."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob

players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Alice: "Ally with me, Bob. We need to eliminate Charlie."
You: "I will not ally with Alice. I need to investigate Charlie next."
Charlie: "Let's all work together to figure out what happened to Diana. We need more information before making any accusations."
